subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|宓|山|t2=mountain||ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s}} – hidden in the mountains, secret, intimate. Note that 宓 means “secret”, which reinforces this.
